go_data.justification: Pep12p is found in complex with hVPS45 and Vps45p, which are implicated in endosomal SNARE complex formation.
Pep12p is found in complex with Vps45p, which serves as a link between Rab5 regulation of endosomal fusion events.
Pep12p is implicated in proper sorting and trafficking of proteins from the TGN to the vacuole.
